headingTag.fieldDescription: Select heading tag, default heading is H2.
headingTag.name: ./headingTag

headingStyle.fieldDescription: Select to change heading style to XL, default style is Large.
headingStyle.name: ./headingStyle

subTitleHeadingTags.fieldDescription: Select heading tag, default heading is Paragraph.
subTitleHeadingTags.name: ./subTitleHeadingTags

subtitleHeadingStyle.fieldDescription: Select to change heading style to Small from Body Default.
subtitleHeadingStyle.name: ./subtitleHeadingStyle

bgColor.fieldDescription: Background Color will appear on desktop and tablet.
bgColor.name: ./bgColor

bgType.fieldDescription: Height of the component is determined by the content.
bgType.name: ./bgType

heightControl.fieldDescription: When selected, the component height will be determined by image
heightControl.name: ./heightControl

decorative.fieldDescription: Select if image should be ignored by assistive technology and therefore does not require an alternate text. This applies to decorative images only.
decorative.name: ./decorative

id.fieldDescription: Optional and unique HTML component ID attribute.
id.name: ./id

panelTitleHeadingTag.fieldDescription: Select heading tag, default heading tag is H3.
panelTitleHeadingTag.name: ./panelTitleHeadingTag

panelEyeBrow.fieldDescription: Never type in all capitals, component will transform the text.
panelEyeBrow.name: ./panelEyeBrow

panelTitle.fieldDescription: Never type in all capitals, component will transform the text.
panelTitle.name: ./panelTitle

panelDescription.fieldDescription: Panel Description will not display on mobile by default.
panelDescription.name: ./panelDescription

displayPanelDescriptionOnMobile.fieldDescription: Select for Panel Description to display on mobile.
displayPanelDescriptionOnMobile.name: ./displayPanelDescriptionOnMobile

urlLink.fieldDescription: For internal links, use selection dialog to locate Target URL page. For external links, enter full URL, starting with https.
urlLink.name: ./urlLink

targetNewWindow.name: ./targetNewWindow
targetNewWindow.text: Open Target URL in new window?

mediaId.fieldDescription: Enter Media ID from Limelight script
mediaId.name: ./mediaId

playerId.fieldDescription: Enter Video Player ID from Limelight script
playerId.name: ./playerId
